sourcesContent: import e from"react";import{jsx as t}from"react/jsx-runtime";const o={footerAlign:"end",rowsPerPage:0,currentPage:1,animated:!0};export const TableContext=e.createContext(o);export const useTableContext=()=>e.useContext(TableContext);export default{Provider:({children:r,defaultValues:n})=>{const[a,l]=e.useState((null==n?void 0:n.footerAlign)||o.footerAlign),[s,i]=e.useState(void 0===(null==n?void 0:n.animated)?o.animated:null==n?void 0:n.animated),[u,d]=e.useState(null==n?void 0:n.collection),[c,P]=e.useState(void 0===(null==n?void 0:n.rowsPerPage)?o.rowsPerPage:null==n?void 0:n.rowsPerPage),[g,m]=e.useState(o.currentPage),[v,x]=e.useState(null==n?void 0:n.color),C=e.useMemo((()=>({animated:s,footerAlign:a,collection:u,rowsPerPage:c,currentPage:g,color:v,setFooterAlign:l,setCollection:d,setAnimated:i,setRowsPerPage:P,setColor:x,setCurrentPage:m})),[s,v,u,a,c,g]);return t(TableContext.Provider,{value:C,children:r})},Consumer:TableContext.Consumer};
